best.label: Best
best.select: You must select one best attribute.

attributes.bestCannotBeWorst: The best attribute must be different from the worst attribute.

extra.label: extra | extra different
extra.less: You have selected {n} extra attribute too many. | You have selected {n} extra attributes too many.

attributes.label: Attributes

optional.less: You have selected {n} optional attribute too many. | You have selected {n} optional attributes too many.

attributes.spend: You must spend {n} additional attribute point. | You must spend {n} additional attribute points.

worst.label: Worst
worst.select: You must select one worst attribute.

select.Disability: You must select {n} additional disability. | You must select {n} additional disabilities.
select.Gift: You must select {n} additional gift. | You must select {n} additional gifts.

talents.select: You must select {n} additional talent. | You must select {n} additional talents.
